You care about the characters, you care about their legal strategy, and you care about the consequences of legal and personal maneuverings. I am halfway through Season 3 and have watched and enjoyed every episode to this point.
I like this show and that I can stream it for no charge as a Prime member. I would do it more often if it didn't take so long to access on my TV. Is it my TV or is it streaming?

I and my wife think this show is wonderful. We love the characters, and the way they are fully dimensional: people you get to know. The writing is so realistic and the dialog is typical of upper middle class professionals and others. See it and get hooked on it. We are catching up on year three now. We can't watch just one episode, we have to watch two at a time.
It was awesome! Love the plot an great acting! Love the Florricks. Hope they get back together! Lawyers really know how to get around the law! Don't care for the sex scenes, gay or straight.
Such a good show!  It's definitely a good "binge watching" series.  I love all of the characters and the smart writing.  I highly recommend it.
Great series. Great acting and unusual stories .  We are looking forward to getting the most recent season in amazon very soon.

Not a fan of most TV shows and my wife and I have seen enough in our life to notice that most plots are reused from the past, but not The Good Wife. Although its considered a drama there are many episodes that it's less about the characters and more about the cases. Season 3 is no exception. Somehow the writers are still finding new types of cases and keeping things interesting. It is refreshing that after two seasons it's still as good as day 1.
I enjoy the characters & the case investigations. The interpersonal relationships between the characters are tastefully portrayed. Court room scenes are interesting too.

In season 2 the once dedicated Alicia begins an affair with her boss and law partner, Will.  This affair becomes the norm in season 3 as the series seems to explore the question, "What does it mean to be a good wife or husband?"  In this case, it is Alicia who has lowered herself to the self-indulgent behaviors for which her husband was scandalously famous.  The tension in this show for me is the fact that the title raises expectations that marital relationships could be guided by virtues, while the characters ongoing, non-virtuous choices are depicted sympathetically.
Really enjoyable show. Start at the beginning and watch the threads over the seasons. This season's exploration of "what does friendship mean" is thought provoking.
Awesome show! The actors are brilliant and the plot is intriguing! I can't get enough of the show. Definitely recommend it!

After watching the first 2 seasons, couldn't wait to watch session 3. It did not disappoint. Love the characters and the on-going story of their lives as well as a snapshot of how the legal system works.
Amazing season! Cant wait to see the season 4 and watch what happens with the firm. I love all characters!!
The Characters have depth and the actors superb.  Screen writers are good, too.  There is someone to love and someone to hate.  Well done!!
Good mix of drama and "soap"- so makes it fun without making it frivolous. Actors are all pretty competent and the law makes it interesting.

As a guy, I can tell that this series is oriented toward women.  It is currently in its 5th season and is ongoing.  Back a few weeks ago, I was idly searching around for a series pilot to look at to see if I wanted to watch a few more episodes of the program.  I watched the pilot episode of this show and I was hooked.  I binged on this thing all the way up to the current episode and am now waiting week by week for the next episode.

This show constantly has several plot strings going on side-by-side, lots of internal law firm intrigue, occasional physical violence and some truly great guest appearances by well known actors.  Since I watched it all in binge mode, i was able to also pick up the foreshadowing tidbits in early episodes which were then exploited in later episodes or seasons.  Also, I enjoyed watching Julianna Margulies' two kids (actors) grow into full teenagers over the course of the 5 years, too.  I noticed that Ridley Scott was involved in writing the episodes, so that pretty much sealed the deal for me.

Every season of the 5 seasons (so far) have been terrific.  I can't recommend it enough, and they all rate 5 stars as far as I am concerned.
Can't wait for the next Season! This show keeps you coming back until you've exhausted all episodes that are available.
This was recommended by my daughter and I really have enjoyed the series and watch them on my iPad whenever I can
It's a great show.  I have watched it since the beginning and never miss it.  Interesting plots and terrific character development.  It also keeps me guessing what wil happen next.
My son and daughter-in-law got into watching this series this year and when they found out I had all the series they borrowed mine. So I bought them their own.

This series is amazing. I have been able to watch all five seasons using Amazon prime. The show is engaging and intelligent. Current events are beautifully integrated  into the story lines. I am totally addicted.
Never watch the show until I watched it through amazon videos. It is a great television drama. Trying to catch up to this season so I can begin to watch during prime time.

Great characters, great actors, good stories. And master of the long tease!
The show also does a great job with the teenagers, especially in their interaction with the Web. Very realistic.
Alicia's character is great! She deals with all the controversy and still takes care of her family.  The series keeps me looking forward to the next show daily.

Writers using current events and more sexually voyeuristic material to spice up the show. Down we go into paperback novel territory in place of more edifying professional legal issues and personal relationships.
Excellent actors and script; held my interest for four seasons and I am easily bored; plus each show teaches me something about laws and legal procedures

I love it. The interaction between Kalinda  and Alicia is tense but still not as enemies. The back-story with the ex-girlfriend and Will adds a new dimention to the currents running just below the surface. The mother-daughter struggle also adds to the drama, and one can feel the stress under which Alicia tries to function.
love all season's of this show!....started in the 4th & have gone back on prime to watch it from the beginning
The Good Wife has great acting, interesting plotlines, characters you continue to be intrigued with......addicting, like a book that is hard to put down.

Edgy, superb acting, thought provoking, and VERY addictive.  It sadly reflects what most of us think of politicians, lawyers and the direction in which society has taken us with technology infringing on our personal lives.
Complex characters in challenging circumstances.  Stories are not predictable.  Intergenerational relationships are believable.  Anyone who likes lawyer shows will probably like this.

This show is sheer brilliance, It is smartly written, well acted by the entire cast, and by far one of the best lawyer shows to grace television. If you thought Boston Legal or L.A Law was decent and you haven't watched The Good Wife, you're in for a real treat!
I would do just about anything not to miss the show.  It all starts with a great script and it just gets better from their.
I came into TGW in season 4, so I wanted to catch up on previous seasons.  One of the best shows on TV.

I started watching at the end of season 3. Matthew Perry was staring and I will watch anything he is in. Well it got me hooked. I got caught up over the holidays and it is even better now that I know more of the back stories.
This is an excellent show!!! My friends and I now plan to meet every Sunday for a Good Wife watch party!

Without having excessive violence, baring breasts or CG, The Good Wife is entertaining, gritty and classy.  I look forward to each and every installment.  Keep up the great script writing, wardrobe, and character interaction!
Great episodes, marathon watched over Christmas break! Quality was decent, although had a few issues from time to time. There was no rhyme or reason to the buffering...never same time in the day.
I am not quite sure how I missed this series.  Started watching it out of curiosity and I am hooked!
Best television show ever! Ever. Acting is great. Writing is great. Wardrobe is fabulous. How can you not watch this?
I love it! I like it! It's a great show! CBS Rules! The best! Now what??? Love it! Watch soon!
The stories are fast well written and creative. Love the side characters that reappear also. This season is wonderful to watch and guess where it's going

I'm obsessed with this show. Started watching during season 3 (now watching season 5 live). Went back to watch from the beginning and kept going into the seasons I've already seen. It's even better in the context of previous shows!
I enjoy this show so much, each episode is different story line with on going characters stories.  So many friends and family said I'd liked so I wanted to watch it from day one,  so glad I did.
I like drama shows.this is no different. A little bit of .mystery has been added to keep you guessing. Time to return....bye!!
We really got into this show, now watching every night on Amazon via Apple TV. Not super deep but very enjoyable.

This show is very believable (most of the time) with a good variety of characters, interesting plots and clever dialogue. If you like good TV drama with a little tension, sex and intrigue; this show is for you.
See comments on season 3 for my thoughts on this show. I am almost complete with Season 4 but don't want to go to fast, I will be sorry to be caught up. This is entertainment.
Best season so far Show is bold and it takes chances with tough real world topics. Love every minute of it.
Good story good acting lots of eye candy. Sex. Tension gets a little tedious. I vote none of the above.

This is a awesomely engaging show. A underdog story, love story and drugs it has it all. The character Alicia will have you in love with her to totally questioning what are you thinking. But I love it. Start with season 1 and get all caught up to season 5 you will see you get addicted to all your favorite characters from other tv shows. This must be the same people who wrote the Wire Series
enjoyed catching up on thngs i had missed in first few seasons.  great acting. will keep looking for new episodes.
I started watching The Good Wife on Amazon from Season 1.  This series gets better and better and does not disappoint! Can't wait to catch up to the current season!

One of the most interesting character, Kalinda is not credible; she is just too good. Show us how she get the information.  She is the one winning most of the cases, tell us more about how she accomplish her miracles.
Great cast. Great stories. My wife and I anxiously await each show. It's my favorite guilty pleasure as I hope it continues for many more years.

Great show.
I like it very much. Can't stop watching it. Keeps me in the loop.
Looking forward to more shows.
Amazon Prime video benefit is the best!  I could go back to see this show in earlier seasons I had never seen.  The series makes so much more sense now!!!
one of the few shows, I highly recommended.  and love viewing it thru amazon, so you can watch continuously.  maybe some of the stories are getting a little unrealistic?  but I am hooked.
My husband does not usually watch tv but I got him interested and he could not stop.  We love this show.  Spent New Year's Eve watching the last few shows and loved every minute of it
I love this show. It has a good story line  and always keeps me wanting more. I can't get enough.
There are not many shows that get a high rating for me, but this one is different. It is visually and intellectually stimulating as well as emotionally absorbing. Well done!
I absolutely love the Good Wife.  Although is she really a good wife?  It is a good thing I have Amazon Prime so I can watch it as much as I want.
I can't wait for each new episode! In one month I've watched all the seasons available & look forward to the next first episode of 2014
I am usually a action adventure kinda guy,  this is a Wicked good drama series that I really do lik, you all should watch this show.(THE GOOD W
It would be nice to be able to watch a show while my kids are around and it have decent content. There goes another crappy show.
My amazon prime for some reason won't let me back in to watch the rest of this seasonvery annoying and I can not figure out how to contact a live person to assist me!!
this show always keeps you on the edge and you never know what will happen next, very good writers but also very good actors

By season 3 this is getting boring.  Characters seem to have lost vitality, and scenes keep repeating.  Yawn!
Don't dislike it yet, but if it doesn't show more life, I will.
All the characters are well written and played. Every episode has been good and the story line is very intriguing.
Great drama and suspense in every episode. I can't stop watching. My wife and I stay up too late watching new episodes

very solid show, a little more intellectual than what most of tv has to offer, except for crime dramas which, after years of having to endure them, have become boring and predictable. just my opinion of course.

continuing the top quality of the first 2 seasons  season 3 just keeps offering great stories per episode along with keeping the ongoing plot lines at a highly provocative level  just can't say enough about this show it is so good  the acting, the writing, the concept  can't believe I did not pick up on this show via TV  worth the $79 I'm paying for Amazon Prime.

This show is definitely one of the best on TV right now.  The writing is excellent.  There is always some sort of BOOM in every show, the storylines make sense and always get wrapped up.  The acting is sensational and the characters all have great chemistry.  There are always great guest stars as well.
Well written and well acted, this show is worth watching. The characters development is great and the story line is intriguing.

I liked the show but it is so one sided and it is absolutely inflammatory when it comes to who conservatives are and what they believe in. I liked the show at one time but the more I watch it the less I like it. It's mean and to say that whites can't pick out the differences in other races because of their ethnicity is completely fraudulent. CBS has used this show as a political ploy to get low information voters to vote on the left. If anyone thinks the political climate in Chicago is anything less and corrupt they are just blind. The real reality is that Chicago is rife with corruption and is not as flowery and sweet as this show would have anyone to believe. Its just gotten out of hand and I'm sorry it sickens me. No wonder I stopped watching CBS a long time ago.  Seriously, the Tea Party is not a bunch of radicals. They are people who want their freedom that the constitution affords them. I do not like this show at all, not anymore. No one politician or lawyer can be everything to everyone.

I love this series, because while each episode can stand alone, there is an interesting plot line that carries the show forward. I enjoy watching the stories of each of the characters. There are s lot of side plots which keep things interesting. It's a great legal drama.
The only problem i had with the disc it kept stopping and I had to rewind it to have it continue on.
It is a great show - suspense, passion, etc. I love trying to figure out who she is going to choose in the end,
good story lines. i would recommend it. I am not very wordy. don't know what else to say. thank you
I enjoyed the season, i wish the last one was free or cheaper to view. I was drawn to the next episode after ever one ended.
Loved it! One of the best series. Always something new going on. Interesting story lines great series one of the best
A friend recommended me to watch this a long time ago.  I finally sat down and watched it.  I started from the beginning and am now caught up to the current season within three weeks.
A fine combination of ongoing plots combined with start-to-finish case mysteries in each episode. Some of the characters are becoming a bit too idiosyncratic for my taste, but still not cardboard.

My go to  show when I take a break during the day. The depictions of the law firm makes me a bit uneasy (not always the highest in the ethics department) but the characters are richly complicated and the plot lines are intriguing.
Just solid tv that is not overly complicated.  I am addicted.  It is possible to set it aside for periods of time and pick back up where you left off.
Great cast in believable real life situations.  Can't wait for next season. I hope they can keep it going and interesting.
This season just gets better! I am streaming on my kindle while exercising - makes time fly by!  Hope this show lasts for a long time.

I started watching The Good Wife on Prime at the beginning of December and I couldn't stop watching until I caught up with the current season. The writing and acting on this show is great. If you like law shows and complicated relationships, watch this show.
Loved the show have all seasons, watched the show many times. Loved to watch it on my amazon prime and DVDs
Best show on TV! Every season is better than the last! Great characters, great stories, never a dull moment with the good wife!

I wish that Alicia would loosen up a little bit, however good for her being a Mama Bear protecting her cubs. The guest actors, Michael J. Fox and Martha Plimpton, among others play wonderful opposing attorneys. Guest judges are just plain fund to watch. No matter what, each character in this show is so fully defined, that when they step beyond what you would expect, it really is a shocker.
Never a dull moment. Keeps my mind engaged throughout the show. I also like the interesting cases they deal with.
Adult drama with clever writing, comments on Today's world, great acting.  My brain feels better after watching this show. Enjoy adult TV.

This season spends a lot of time laying the groundwork of each show and then all of a sudden they've solved everything and won the case, and you're left wondering how?  So you'd better be paying attention.  They would have been better off making each story line two shows and filling it out.  However it's still good, I'm still interested in seeing how the characters move along, so still watching it.
We know this is a lawyer's soap opera but a good one. Like the mixture of characters and the interaction. One wonderful thing about watching on Amazon Prime. NO COMMERCIALS!
Cannot get enough of this series and love getting it on my roku via amazon.  I am completely hooked and so enjoy the actors that are in the show.

I would give it a five stars but I like to be tight with judgment, I always hope to find something better or improving.
Besides the court portion sometimes is too repetitive and the typically one episode timeframe makes it very 'American' but less real.

I think this is an extremely well written tv series with interesting characters.
So glad I could stream this season through Amazon Prime!!!  Such a great show!! Can't wait to stream the other seasons!
This series is fantastic-- it's certainly shows the plus and minus side of a big law firm -- and the inter firm politics!
It was a roller coaster season that brought back some old cast in a fresh way and by the end brought back the original tone of the series as well.
Loved the season and love watching in on prime video.  Everything on watch on prime is great and love watching on my tablet.
Love it! We did a marathon to catch up on previous seasons.  Mid-season break at the holidays is a drag, though.
I like the story lines.  The episodes have a consistent theme across multiple episodes.  This make the show easy to follow.
Great series, enjoyed it very much.  Watched all four seasons, wish I could've kept up with current season (5), bu will catch that one as well...

Well written and well acted.  With streaming available,  it is difficult to watch just one or two episodes at a time. Sometimes we have watched 5 or six episodes at one sitting.  Excellent cast lead by Julianna Marguiles.
I am enjoying this series. I have not finished watching all the shows yet but I like it so far.
Me and my girlfriend love this show. Alicia florick is a great character. I like how she begins so innocent but then the line she is willing to cross becomes blurred.
I've enjoyed every season and you just never know what might be coming around the corner.  Can't wait until the next season is available.
Great character development. Clever twists to some of the cases and to the private lives of the characters. It's so good to see women actors in strong roles
We have enjoyed this show very much. Sadly lately  the repeated graphic portrayal of homosexual scenes that are offensive to us have determined that we will no longer be watching this show.
Excellent story line and acting !  Keep one watching episode after episode. Very addicting story line. And wonderful actors. Glad I got to catch up

Little is black and white in this show and the characters are all very human.  Sometimes i even think about what is happening to them when i am not watching the show.  One starts to care for them.  My wife who is not a big TV watcher is hooked and often refers to characters in our every day conversation.  The family situations are also most fraught and realistic.
Same old lines.  Same old sex scenes.  Same old political agenda.  Then the plot degenerates.  I'm tired of this stuff.  How about just a good story.

Don't know how I missed this series.  After getting a new TV which accommodates Amazon Prime, my Wife and I watched The Good Wife from season 1 thru season 4.  It became our entertainment each night for several weeks.  It is hands down the best show on TV.  Can't wait for season 5, episode 11.

Characters you care about tangled with characters you'd gladly strangle, plots with humor, pathos, intrigue, and the messy process of just... Not justice but law.  Corruption, lying, scandal, and people trying to do good jobs in the midst of ths mess. cliffhanger endings and great acting. Fine show!
Great show. Great characters and storylines. I love watching Alicia evolve throughout the series. Cool show totally addictive. Watch it
LOVE IT! GREAT LOVE THE SHOW, GREAT CAST GREAT STORY LINES . SHOWS EQUAL POWER OF BOTH MEN AND WOMEN IN THE LAW
Great show! Cast and writers are great! So glad my sister told me to watch. A cliffhanger every episode. Love amazon prime too!
i am exciting about the new eppisodes.the drama is the best. I can't wait to see the next season.love it. Yes
Great series, excellent story line, good actors.  The courtroom scenes are very believable. The Florricks keep things interesting, that's for sure!

I started watching this show by chance while channel surfing one Sunday evening and enjoyed it so much I went back to the first episode and viewed them all.  What initially attracted me was the affiliation with the Scott brothers; the superb casting and acting has kept me coming back from week to week.  Finally, some watchable Sunday night programming! The premise is believable and the characters are well fleshed out.
Great acting and story line!! This show always has such interesting cases and the actors do a fabulous job!  My husband and I look forward to watching it every night!!
great subject, great actors, keeps me on my toes waiting for each episode to start. Let's hope will run for another 4-5 years.

LOVE IT LOVE IT LOVE IT
My favorite character changes every show. OBSESSED with the drama. Will is my hero.

My wife and I love this show. Well done, great acting and good plots. Can't say enough. Can't stop watching even for a moment. Diane, Alicia, Will, Cary, Kalinda, Peter, David, Eli and the whole cast. So much talent.

Amazon Video streaming thru my RoKu box is so easy and is very compatible with my flat panel TV.
Awesome show!! I wish I had watched when it was originally air but then that is why Amazon Prime is so Great! I am catching up.
I wish I had a weekend straight where I could watch the entire season at once but I, regrettably, I don't. I love this show!
Great quality picture. No buffeting and no commercials. It was a pleasure to be able to catch up on the episodes I missed without losing the feeling of the big screen
I am going to have to get this out and start watching it again because I swear this current season just "jumped the shark"

Without giving any spoilers, the music this season is awesome. They really went above and beyond to get some awesome smaller bands in this season. All of the cliffhangers from season 2 are dealt with adequately and they do a good job with backroom deals and neat technology in this season.
The entire series is worth watching and then RE-watching! I am savoring each episode through season 3 because I know I only have one to watch after this one!
Best drama on network TV bar none. All star cast and great writing. Well worth the Sunday nite wait for football
Best writing on television! Great story lines and acting! Very sexy! It will steam up your television! Love it! Don't miss it!
I plan on buying everyone of the past and current CD of the Goodwife. This TV show is great and you can't get enough of it.

I like so much this season.
Now I have the issue that I can not watch since my country (Peru)
Excellent show. I would give it more stars if I could! Each episode draws me in deeper into the lives of the characters. I'm hooked!

At first glance at the title, I didn't think I'd care for the show....a philandering husband with a wife who didn't dump him on the spot. I think a better title would have been 'The Good Mother.'

The writers and actors do a superb job portraying real life relationship dilemmas. The sub plots - quandaries of legal firm management and interesting clientele keep one coming back and enjoying the ride.
Great show. The acting and production are fantastic. We go back to our other shows and they just seem cheesy after watching this.
Great acting, keeps my interest. My wife and I are always ready for the next one. Love having no ads.
It's fun watching these episodes one after another.  I love streaming TV episodes.  It's so convenient to watch this way.

Like most tv series that continue for a long time, you get acquainted with the actors and like most soap operas, like to see them do well or badly in their endeavors depending on you personal feelings of each one. This series has stood the test of times and with good story lines as well as good acting, offers many of us great entertainment. Well done.

This is an excellently written and wonderfully acted dramatic series with a contiuing story line while each episode stands on it's own. The series is in it's fourth year and we are enjoying the journey as we catch up. We believe the show gets better with each episode!
And the drama continues! You would think that the show would start to be boring by now, but it gets better. I love watching the court trials. They can be quite entertaining.

Way above average soap. Excellent cameos. Legal details somewhat questionable.
Overall, very engaging and diverting.
Worth the time spent watching.
It's a great drama. Great acting  with unique & interesting characters with excellent writing! You become involved with the characters !
This show covers everything from dirty politics to family issues. It is a show for the sophisticated adulr. The acting is outrageously good.
I have watched it from the beginning and have recently gone back to see previous episodes. They don't get old, they get get better with age.
Enjoy stories related to Chicago & Illinois politics and locations. Best are the legal battles and resolutions. Disappointed that the sexual content keeps me from watching with my grandchildren.
Felt so apart of Alicia and all aspects of her life.  Great balancing and emotional distribution from all angles of the characters.  Loved it.
Great diversity with the plot and character development.  Keeps you on the edge of your seat and wanting to see the next episode.  Very addicting!
The season started out slow.  I almost gave up on it.  I gave it another try and am addicted again.
This season is tremendous. Do not miss a minute of it. Excellent acting and writing.. You will be mesmerized by the interwoven plots.
Each season gets better & better. All the actors are outstanding. Such good continuing story lines. Very smart,trendy & realistic.
I absolutely love this show! I think I prefer to watch the entire season at one time though versus weekly episodes
I really enjoy the characters and the variety of cases presented.  Gives me a better understanding of how the law really operates.
The series has produced consistently good story lines, good acting and characters that draw you in. I recommend it highly.
Great show, another great season. Hard to stop watching each night... A law show with so many side stories to keep you engaged... The Good Wife is The Good Show.
Phenomenal this show always has you at the edge of your seat. The acting is superb.the writers keep you nail biting from start to finish
Extremely well-written with plenty of interesting cases while maintaining a very intriguing and compelling internal storyline. One of the best TV dramas that I've watched.

The writing is superb with big story arcs.  The acting is great too.  I usually don't care much for Chris Noth, but think he did a fine job in this series.  Juliana Marguiles (sp?) gives an incredible performance as a woman piecing her life back together after a major betrayal by her husband of fifteen years and the ensuing public scandal.  Supporting roles are equally well-acted..  The office intrigue is realistic, as is the general insanity of the law as a profession.
This is one of the smartest tv series ever.  Just good writing and acting making it a show to look forward to.
I am a TV snob. This show is very good. It has quality performances, and good nuanced story lines. This season may have had some shaky sub-plots, but overall I enjoyed each episode.
Love the show and the cast of characters. Have watched it from the beginning episode and will watch season four
Very good,, always keeps my interest.  Love the varied court cases and the different people in the firm.  Hope it continues.

I'm recommending this series to all of my friends. Great drama.  Excellent writing, plot twists, and character development. Watching this series is the highlight of my evenings. The dinner dishes cleared away, on these chilly fall evenings I take to my chair, fire up the iPad, and escape to view The Good Wife. I highly recommend!
Like a bag of chips.  You can't just eat one!  At this point, I'll have to go on a diet=)
I love this series . Cannot seem to get enough of it. The Florricks are the.bomb! The story line is so current.
Great show. I watched all the past 4 seasons. I like the romance!!!! Started watching the new season and it is good.
Very good episodes of the good wife. More law this time but it was excellent. One will definitely be pleased with this season. Promise

The Good Wife is a terrific series that continues to hold my attention.  It defies the standard formulaic progression many of the dramatic series fall prey to; focusing too long on one particular relationship or rehashing the same story lines.  Just when you think you can guarantee what is about to happen the story turns left.
Great TV!  There are twists and turns each episode.  We especially enjoy the lack of commercials.  Watching a show when you want to watch is icing on the cake.
Really good show, actors bring the characters to life. Can't wait for the new season to come out. Good job CBS
Love this series! Great actors, great scenarios, amazing show. Love how she's still the good wife! 5 stars. Would give a 10!
This is the best lawyer show on television. Very well written and well acted. Can't wait for season four! Excellent!
The Lead character is no longer naive.  Alicia is learning to bend the rules to win inside and outside the court.
I started watching from season 1 and got hooked. Each season is better than the last one. Great writers and great acting. Love the series.
There is more tension this season and it is great! Another season of interesting cases, I enjoy the recurring guest characters.
The entire season was excellent as usual.  The final episode is a real cliff hanger - can't give any details without giving the excitement away.
I enjoy this show.  Good writing, good characters, but some of the situations are a bit far-fetched, specifically it seems as if nothing could be accomplished without Kalinda.
Went back and watched the whole first three seasons. It is such a good show. Just wondering how they are going to end this show....

I enjoy the series  and on my second viewing.  missed some of the dialog first time around.,
but I don't care for the daughter, maybe it's the way she's written into the series.
I couldn't stop watching. Great character development and I like that the episodes weren't as scary as some of the other shows in this genre.

I don't watch much tv because most of it seems like trash tv to me. I do enjoy watching The Good Wife because I consider it well written, intelligent  and entertaining. I like that every week we have a new law case to settle while the story of the characters personal lives winds its way through each episode like an adult soap opera. And I LOVE Eli Gold !
I love this show, and season 3 is another season that has captured my heart and attention, unfortunately when I should be doing other thing!
Great, loved it.  I watch "The Good Wife" every chance I get.  Amazon Prime is wonderful, I love not having to watch commercials.
It just gets better and better! I'm so hooked, I'll be in Good Wife withdrawal when I finish all the seasons...

Wow!! The best season yet! Omg! I never thought there will be a day that I'll be disappointed at Alicia... Can't wait to see how this play out... But I fear the Alicia and Will team is never going to happen... :-(..

This is a good show. I do find it typical of the lawyer courtroom drama shows.
I've not spent much time in real court rooms so I don't really know what is just tv drama and how much is true life lessons in the study of the law. Having said that, I will add I found this season entertaining.

i watched on network television when it first came out... and now that a friend is hooked, he is watching much of what i already saw and it is fun to re connect...but i have missed several shows... seeing it via amazon is NICE
Amazing performances, I laughed, I cried, I ignored all phone calls and emails as I fell in love with the gw family!

Love this show. Brilliantly written. Stunning performances. Specxtacular (Emmy winning) guest stars. With the whole season on DVD - can fight the withdrawal I feel every week when the current episode ends and i know I have to wait 7 days for the next one.

Love everything about this series!!!  This is a catch up for me and I am so glad I went back and watched this season and now season 4
And, its always better when you can get through the hold program without any commercials.  I am looking forward to season 4.
OUTSTANDING writing and acting - the close of the season was very sad.  They have become family.  I wonder how long this series will last as it seems all the ones I like die prematurely.
I like this show a lot. It's a great combination of developed character story plots along with new plot from each client.
Enjoyed The Good Wife now binge watching season 4 Great acting and love all the very famous guest stars. Love Ari Gold

Great show, love the character development and the court cases; have enjoyed each show immensely and would recommend it.  Great to have on my Kindle Fire for free as a Prime member (so worth it) as I can take it just about anywhere with me.

This show is one that we have wanted to see from the beginning (season 1, episode 1).  I am glad that we waited until we could follow the scripts in chronological order.  It provides an interesting insight in how the legal system works.  I especially enjoy how they map out their strategy, and the third season is full of strategy sessions .  Also there are very interesting characters to follow.  My favorite are Alicia, Colinda and Eli.
Great characters. Good story line. I spent the summer watching all the seasons. I suggest it to anyone who is looking for a new show to watch.
Amazon Prime is the best , it has become my favorite shopping venue. 2 day shipping and Simply the very best app for watching movies and television shows.

Great stories very interesting. I couldn't stop watching this show.

Great characters . Like that it is in Chicago. Thank you
It is a great series and it is so much better watching it on amazon prime so you aren't interrupted by the endless commercials.
This show has a lot of heart.  Each character brings such great chemistry to each episode and they often surprise me.  I am totally addicted and forfeit sleep to watch just one more episode.

I chose this rating because first of all, the writing was superb.  Irrespective of all the love and drama that went on, there were some great cases tried in these episodes.  They were really intelligent and daring.

Entertainment of this variety is a personal taste.  I really enjoy this show for it smart script and the quality of the various actors. I find with most TV drama i can consistently predict what is going to happen next, but that is not the case with this show, and I like that it is that way.

If one enjoys sitcoms, and action drama this may not be your cup of tea.  If you prefer drama that cause you to think, then this may be for for you.

Let me reiterate that we all have personal taste.  There is nothing wrong with enjoying sitcom an/or action drama.  For example my wife does and I personally think she is a terrific human being!

What a great lawyer show! It is good to see people from ER in this series. I cannot wait till next season. It is great to have all seasons available.
Dr George Tomes
The dialogue is so well written for these excellent intriguing characters; in addition you have very talented actors playing these juicy roles.
I love how it never gets old and how there is usually drama after drama. I just love it! -
I like this show because the characters display a great work, the drama is ok, but the fabulous way the good wife handles her private life

But really hope she goes with Will and starts her own firm.
She's done very well with herself through the seasons, can't wait for more episodes.
I am addicted. I had no life until I caught up to the current season. Streaming is crisp and fast.
I'm adicted to the show.  I guess it is both the characters that are being developed and the legal cases they have to deal with.
A great series that keeps you waiting for the next show.  This is a series you should not miss. Wish there were more like this one.

The writers continue to parody current political events with striking yet fictionalized accounts of celebrity politicians, businessmen and old legal cases.  Can you find Klaus von Bulow?  Rahm Emanuel?  Mark Zuckerberg? Or can you? The parodies are striking yet lovable - giving entre to a world none of us may ever know.  Certainly we are behind the doors and behind the minds and teeth of high-powered big city legal council.  It's a feast.
I ran out of Episodes of Mad Men and Breaking Bad and latched on to Good Wife. I wish Kalinda  and Cary would get a spin off. Not as supenseful as Breaking Bad.
Realistic dialogue, well scripted and up to date on current legal issues that exist in our society. Interesting and thought provoking.
Superb writing, acting, character development, and direction. Amazon wants me to write more: There is nothing about this series that I do not love.

Amazingly witty and fun. Frequently find myself laughing out loud.  Tackles some great legal issues despite making them such that they fit into a 40 minute narrative.  They also get the closest to any show of what a lawyer's firm experience is. This show has given me a great many de ja vu moments with respect to my own career as an attorney.  The quality of the acting is also beyond reproach.
Great show coming from network tv.  At the end of an episode it makes you want to know what happens next.
Great show, keeps you wanting more on every episode, husband cheats on wife which leaves the family in a whirl wind of a story.

The cases are excellent. Sorry I'm get tired of typing. I don't think I'll rate anything else anytime soon. Too many words are required. It says I've used enough but I want to make sure. Two plus two equals four and it should. There are a lot of things that add up and they should. I'm done. I like this program. The Good Wife. You may not. But I do. I hope my review helps.
The Good Wife, is built on an "old" hook, but the twists and turns, subplots, and character development continue to keep me interested. Gotta start with the beginning of the series, though.
This series offers great entertainment, including good story line, characters, acting, and cleverness of plots, Very well organized and presented.

All the plots and all the characters are intriguing to watch.

Character presence and development is authentic.

We especially enjoy the reappearance of quirky larger-than-life characters from time to time
who arrive to complicate things or just upset the flow of things temporarily.
Topical cases paired with intriguing personal and political plot lines. I'm hooked! It's nice to find a show that makes me think amidst the less cerebral shows out today.
Great storyline and well written characters. A friend recommended the show. I started at the beginning and I was hooked.
The good wife is a very WELL portray real life court drama. Can't wait till you add series#5-6. Please keep it coming. Another series I'm looking forward to come back is ArmyWife!!

It is a trully entertaining as well as stimulating viewers' thinking production.  The characters are endearing, presenting a wide spectrum of human variety, intelligent, passionate in their personal goals and values.  The interactions beautifully reflect the complexity of relationships where personal and social interests clash and intertwine.  The series stands out, in addition to other aspects, with relatively little violence, while keeping viewers in suspense.  It is not an easy challenge in the market where suspense and excitement is usually created mostly by the use of physical violence  and criminal activities.  While The Good Wife plots obviously include criminal behaviors and thinking patterns, the lines are often subtle and blurred, demonstrating complexity of human reality.
While generally not a fan of popular TV series and drama, The Good Wife is among my favorites.  I find myself returning to episodes from all 4 seasons, welcoming the characters as old friends I miss.
Thank you for the beautiful, educational as well as entertaining production.
Excellent TV drama, Good subject matter, great dialogue and intelligent plots. The characters seem like real life people,complex and interesting.
Love this show! Great actors and great plots. Julianna is awesome, I would watch any show she is acting in.
great show, excellent writing & acting, love the character development, hope the new seasons are as good as the old ones
Great characters and acting. Personal asides are believable even if some of the legal cases are a stretch. Good blend of personal, legal and political situations, and likable characters.
Great show fast paced, with likeable characters that you just can't stop watching. I am not a huge tv person and I can watch more than a few ep in one day.
It is especially good to watch the past seasons commercial free to catch up on all the story line. Good writers, good performances by the actors!
I love the Good wife.  Almost finished with Season 3 and can't wait to continue!  Great cast!  Love Will, he is my favorite.

Great writing, great female characters and really good actors.

For better or worse the premise of this show continues to remain a current topic of conversation. Its interesting to see these political marraiges after the hoopla dies down. I like the way they write the charachter of Alicia Florrick and all of the other characters around her. David Lee - he kills me.

Something's been gnawing at me about this show and I just put my finger on it....well educated women in their early 40s--in the time-period in which this show takes place--don't think or act as this main character does.  Even the title is ridiculous!
I've enjoyed most of the performances, and think the court cases we've seen have been exceptional, but the relationships are just sooooooooo far fetched!  Alicia referring to Kalinda as a best friend is ludicrous! Neither character (as written) has shown much interest in getting to know one another beyond case-work or the occasional barroom "shot." In regards to the parent/child relationships, Alicia is clueless re: her teenage kids and disregards their emotional well-being, barely answering their questions/concerns about much of anything: again, that kind of hands-off parenting went out of vogue an entire generation ago.
I haven't decided if I will keep watching this series or not.  Indeed, I've only stuck with it because it's free with my prime membership.  If I had to pay extra I'd have "turned the channel" on The Good Wife a long time ago!
I truly have enjoyed this series.  The acting is excellent and the plotlines keep me interested.  It is definiely worth watching.
Loved power watching - as many episode at a time that I could stand.  So hooked, I am buying each current season episode on Amazon for 1.99 ea.  Worth it.
Love this show! This season is escalating as the characters display a more personal touch to the actions they perform.

What's not to like here?  Juliana M is cool and calm and Baranski is very cool and Josh Charles is charismatic/charming and capable and they all look and perform GOOD and the writing is snappy and the show always has little twists and turns and moves along very fast but you always catch up.  Whaddddddddddddddda ride, fun and colorful.  Kudos to the writers/producers/directors and all involved.

What an engrossing series.  I have been binge watching and can't watch just one at a time...it's that good.  In addition to the weekly procedural there is an on going thread of intrigue involving Alicia - The Good WIfe - and her straying husband, as well as twists and turns involving the law firm she works for.  Many previous adversaries and aquaintenances are brought back through different episodes creating a great family of characters.  Wonderful guest stars , Michael J Fox, Brian Denehey and many others, return from time to time. Just great TV.
Can't stop! This show has it all. I have to force myself to stop watching and go to sleep. Awesome!
Love the show love the actors and it's still on the air so you no it's good if you like court shows you will like this one
The show is great. We get to see interesting law cases and the characters are vivid, like-able and believable. We love it.
This shoiw is addictive.  I have finished all seasons and started watching the 5th season on TV.  Just keeps getting better.  Can't stop watching.
It's not just good, the Good Wife is Great! Love the interactions, the characters, the tension, the suspense. The cases are great, the actors are great! Terrific show!
Well written, great acting, fascinating characters and plots.  GREAT TV. We all enjoy it, male and female alike!  Must watch!
The characters in this show are just the right pitch for me. Some times the cases or stories get a bit weak but the characters keep carrying it through.
love the show can't wait for the next season to start. Alicia is a good wife. And a great lawyer.

Excellent writing, a cast of extremely talented professionals capable of perfect performances that continually define their characters with new information for us. Transparent directing. Top level production values. Some very timely, interesting and informative story lines that do not always please you with their outcomes and thus seem the more real for it.  This is great TV.
This is a great show! I'll just leave it at that. I would give many more reviews if Amazon streamlined this process and didn't require so much writing.

The storyline of each episode is interesting and holds my attention. The characters are RIVETING! Once you are hooked, watching Kalinda is a major treat. She is an intense and driven character and you must know more about her. Watching the show is very addictive because you want to put the pieces of the current story line together, but you also want the writers to reveal a little nugget about the characters.
This is a good series to turn to when you only have a limited time to watch TV but want to relax. The characters are interesting and the storyline is well written. A good consistent series.
this is a very good show,  I love the relationship between Will Alicia and peter.  Kalinda is good at what she do.

So well written for each character. The actors mix well and the drama in which they create or react to in many of te situations. Love the judges roles and how each one has such quirks in the way they run their court room. Very intriguing.
I really love this show. It was way more interesting then what the previews showed. Interesting show content and great actors.
Well into season 3 and they've still kept me hooked. They've been true to the characters they created and kept the story lines engaging.
This is a well written TV show that's full of drama. The characters are intelligent and engaging to watch as each case unfolds.

I absolutely love The Good Wife! It is an excellent show and has the perfect balance of drama and suspense. It is very clearly written by a liberal, but I enjoy it nonetheless. This season did not disappoint and leaves you dying to see season 4!
Well written and acting is great.  Story dialog has stayed fresh.  Could lose the sex scenes.  Love the characters and how they work together.
I have enjoyed catching up on episodes missed, since I have been busy with kids and life in general lately.

This is a fantastic series The writing, the actors, the premise.....all fantastic. I watch an episode, on Amazon, just about every day. If I could change on thing about the show it would be in the pilot, where Alicia slaps her cheating, shit of a husband,  I would like it to be either a punch or a good swift kick in the balls. I'm easy and could go with either as long the last we see of him in this episode, is him face down on the floor....

Great plots often drawn from the headlines with all-over-the-map relationships among the ensemble cast. While "Calinda" may have won an Emmy, other characters give equally superb performances in the series that is about a law firm  always on the brink of bankruptcy ,or a lawsuit (theirs not their clients), or their own internal wars and romances.
it's a fast and intriguing drama.  Once you see one episode, you can't wait to see what happens next... You are hooked.

Well-acted, tautly-written drama with good characterization and plot development.  This series has so far resisted the fate of many series in their third year or later - they often turn into soap operas as the writers become desperate for ideas.  The weakness - Julianna Margulies is the least-talented member of the cast, and the episodes are enjoyable despite, rather than because of her.  Christine Baransky is the brightest light in a stellar cast.
Both my wife and I are enjoying The Good Wife. There is a different law case in each episode and a continuing story which is interesting. Besides Margeles and Panjabi are not bad to look at!
The Good Wife is worth the time I spent watching. Entertaining and I love Alan Cumming. I was waiting for Alicia to get a backbone.
Great TV series if you like law and politics. My wife and I are hook on this show. Watching an episode per night before we go to bed has become a ritual.
One of several lawyer shows but the plots and acting on this one are the best. Always something new and the viewer is never sure of any plot outcome. Well worth watching!

My mom had loved this show and I knew I would like it and LOVE option on Amazon prime to watch when and where I want - just sad b/c already to season 4 and I watch it to work out and on ipad to go to sleep.  Good drama and story line.

One of my favorite shows, this season was awesome,an I enjoyed watching.
I can't wait to see what they have in store for season four .
I truly enjoyed all show so far I hope the writers continue giving us great story lines. I am looking forward to season five (5)

I have been hooked on this show from the first episode.  Love the characters and how complicated they can be.  Looking forward to Season 4 when Alicia and Carey start their own law firm.  Exciting!  Can't wait.
Great series. Like the players and the plots. Can't think of what more to write. Love Alicia. Kids are annoying.
Every week this show brings edge if your seat drama, plus the audience gets a peak at Alicia's personal life.
Luckily for me my mother's birthday is on August and this series almost always makes its new season release around this month.  It has been the perfect gift since I bought the first season.
Always entertaining the Good Wife delivers another exceptional season. This well casted drama is a network hit with a nicely woven script.

I have gotten hooked on this show.  I could easily watch several episodes in a row it I didn't limit  myself to one per night.  Amazon just included season 4 with Prime now that season 5 should be starting.  Well written and produced

Completed a review regarding Season 2 and this is just a repeat of how richly deserving this series is for the highest rating.  The writing and production level maintains the very best entertainment offering of anything on television...episode after episode.
Great tv show with well written characters and stories. As soon as you watch the first episode I think it sucks you in :)

Some of the best TV writing and acting, especially for a non-cable TV show.  Season 3 continues to weave a richly textured drama. I love that the show presumes you are smart enough to follow the narrative and doesn't spoon feed you along the way. I feel like I'm being treated like an intelligent adult. The court cases continue to be culturally and politically relevant. The personal dramas ebb and flow and just when you think maybe it's getting a bit too melodramatic, they move on. I'm really impressed that this show has made it into the third season and maintained its quality. Many shows really nose dive in Season 3.
I love this show and watching it on Kindle is great - no commercials ! I have been catching up on all the shows I missed.
Each episode is smart, entertaining and not predictable.  I can't wait for the new season to start.  I enjoy watching the older episodes, as far as I'm concerned, it is the best show on TV.
Every season of this show that I have watched so far has been fantastic. So glad I stumbled upon it!

Excellent.  Entrancing.  Well acted. Highly recommended.  I absolutely love that is is relatively unpredictable.  The characters are easy to relate to despite their profession.  Less about the law,  more about the human aspects,  which I appreciate.
Just finished season one and have begun watching season two... not there yet, but I' certain I will like it.

I am an outdoors kind of guy. My taste in movies usually revolve around action, be it western, war, cop, etc. with a good dose of sci-fi and horror but to be honest, this is one of the best series I have ever seen. Top notch casting and perfect writing. I loved it from the first episode on and have yet to be disappointed by a single episode through all 4 seasons. Hats off to the series. I can't believe it but I am a devout fan, totally hooked and can't wait for more..!!!!!
I really enjoy the story lines and actors. It keeps me waiting to see how the writers  develope my favorite characters.
I just love this show, especially when the lawyers be planning their cases. They research and do a lot of maneuvering just to win a case.
fun to see the characters evolve from season to season. I also love the legal stories they tackle, very thought provoking

this is a great show.  it has a very smart story line that is suspenseful and exciting.  this is the show to watch.
The characters have dept to them, plot is good, this is a series that I enjoy and can't wait to see the next one...
The acting is always superb and story line intriguing. Hopefully the series will continue for a few more years, please.
This is an exceptionally entertaining TV series. Great drama with Perry Mason endings. Be sure to watch the previous seasons first.
I thoroughly enjoy watching this show on my kindle....hubby & kids watching their own things and I retreat to the bedroom and lose myself in this very well written and superbly acted show!

I really like this show. I think it is a balanced show with a bunch of different characters. And I am from the upper Midwest which makes it even more appealing to me.
It caught my attention from the very first episode. And I was addicted. Couldn't stop watching. One episode would end and I had to watch the next right asay
Terrific!  Season 3 continues to be as good as seasons 1 and 2.  Can't wait to watch 4 and 5.
We don't have cable.  Stumbled upon this show on amazon prime and really enjoy it.  Court, politics, realistic romance without the soap opera...
Great story line. Great actors. My husband and I love watching it. We can't wait to see the next season.  Hope it never ends.

Strong character development through courtroom and personal encounters make this a great dramatic series. We only starting watching this show after it appeared on Amazon Prime streaming videos.  Great acting and storylines make this a five star series.
The addiction started with Season 1 and carries through Season 3 with a vengeance.  I breathed a sigh of relief when Season 4 hit "Prime" this week.
The episodes of Season Three are watchable and addictive studies in deviousness, strategies for life, and work-life balance. Exasperation with Will builds!
Fantastic movies, I know a lot how the lawyer works! Guilty and no guilty is not decided what you have done, instead it depends on your money and lawyer.

I truly enjoy this type of entertainment ~ even if it is a soappy! Sometimes I watched the episodes all day!
This was a fascinating series and well done.  I am looking forward to the coming season. The writers' formats were excellent in maintaining viewer interest and involvement.
The show is well written the characters, well developed. I really enjoy this show and can't wait for the next season to be released
The third season was great. Great character development and story line. Waiting for season 4 to become available on Amazon now.
The acting is terrific, and the characters are ones you care about-- even those you don't particularly like!  There is no arguing with the acting, and the story keeps viewers hooked week after week.
The point of view is a bit cynical, but then, since OJ, who trusts lawyers anyway? Sometimes the plots are so gripping as to make one hold one's breath!
Really good drama series! Holds your attention and makes you want to watch the next episode! Can't wait to finish it.
Season three is great, worth watching especially right now when new programming has not started for the fall. The story lines are easy to follow while still being very interesting.

Decent acting and great plots.  I couldn't stop watching.  The characters' profiles are respected to the end which must be difficult to achieve when they all have both good and bad aspects of their personas.
I would definitely recommend this show,it is rich in the level of story complexity and in the development of the characters and how they intertwine.
Continuation of the ongoing story of the Floric Family. Continued interesting legal issues and development of the practice and conflist with the prosecutor's office.
Love this show.  There are at least three plot lines that keep going at once to keep me interested.  The character development is just awesome.  Just love it.

I love it. Alicia is such a great character and the dynamic is really interesting. I love this series, and I love crime drama, though not all crime drama lovers will necessarily appreciate this series since its not focus on action or saving lives, but rather the intricacies of the legal system and the day to day drama of the legal team. Overall, worth at least a shot.
Great case law, complex characters, very well written. Great to see the evolution of the characters from season 1 to season 3

Excellent show, engrossing, good acting, good story line and writing...just plain good TV!!  That's what I liked about it.  Nothing to dislike.  Have and will continue to recommend to my friends and family.

i enjoyed this show from Amazon instant video.  was able to watch it without commercials and no interruptions so i didn't miss a thing except i'm a season behind.

i love Amazon Prime!!
good story lines; want more from Alicia and Will's desire for each other; Calinda story can be more developed too
But thank goodness I can get the DVD's so I can catch up in time for the new season.  Awesome series!
I Loved Julianna when she was on ER but I love her even more on The Good Wife.  She is excellent at not revealing what she is thinking and wears a poker face really well.
I like the excellent character development.  Plot is neither too slow, nor too fast.  I can really lose myself in the characters and stories.
This is just getting better and better every season this is well written one of the series that I am always looking forward to watch.
your time is valuable and it's limited so if you are going to watch a program that don't insult your intelligence. The good wife is smart  T.V . folks .Enjoy.
This show just keeps getting better and better!  My husband got hooked on it now too so I actually ordered this season to get him caught up.

I've been addicted to The Good Wife ever since I joined Amazon Prime.  I raced through Seasons 1, 2 and 3 in record time. I would especially recommend the series to anyone entertaining the notion of attending law school because it portrays a realistic view of what is involved in being a lawyer.  Excellent program and I can't wait to see the future seasons.
The Good Wife is an awesome show..  it peaks in this season. There's something fun, interesting, and/or tantalizing in each episode. Great cast, characters, and guest stars.
I so enjoy watching (and rewatching) "The Good Wife"; the casting and acting are superb and the timeliness of the topics never fail to interest me.

This is one of my favorite series.  Watching Alicia take the punches brought on by her husband, the press, attorneys, co-workers, evil mother-in-law &  confused kids and keep her dignity and grace in tact is heartwarming.  Her strength and courage under extreme pressure, and her ability to keep her head, outwit prosecutors and be the comforting hand holding attorney really show what women are made of.  Tough when we need to be, thoughtful and comforting when we need to be, and able to carry all those hats and stay sane.  Julianna Margulies is brilliant!  The supporting cast and co-stars are equally intriguing and have developed well.  The depth and topics discussed are informative and interesting!  Just a GREAT very well written show!
I continue to think that this is one of the best written, best acted and best conceived show on TV
Great T V series. Can't wait for season 4 to come out for free on Instant Prime! Thank you AmazonPrime.

My wife and I love this show.  The legal battles are entertaining, and the personal intereactions are interesting enough to keep your attention.  We find ourselves talking about the show the next day, wondering what will happen, discussing opinions about characters and issues.  Well done!
It is such a great tv show! I hate that I am playing catch up.  I cannot wait to see what the next season is going to hold for Alicia and the rest of the cast

Very good season, every chapter has its unique story, I always enjoy the Kalinda character, it seem that she does a very interesting daily taks about investigating others.

I didn't really think much of this because there isn't much buzz. But its actually really good. I great show to get into.

I need five more words.

This is Such a well written show with very well developed, real, and complex characters! It is amazing how from one episode to the next, the characters you love and hate can switch places, much like real life.
The Good Wife is so well written and portrayed. Every season is a work of art. Being able to fit humor in just right in a drama is not easy. This show pulls it off perfectly.

I wasn't sure I would like this series but after getting into just a few sessions in season 1 I was hooked and watched all three seasons.  I'm just going to have to wait until season 4 is free to watch...
Addicted to series! Thought show was more about  snoottie politics. Love the law firm setting and characters. Plenty of personality. Look forward to season 5

I love The Good Wife Season 3 because it keeps you wanting to see more episodes. I especially love the topics and guest stars on the show. The character Kalinda is very intriguing. I highly recommend this entire series.
I love the chemistry between all the characters in this show.  I am anxious to see Season 4 as Season 3 ended with a cliff hanger.
Great season with a talented cast and amazing writing. Couldn't stop watching, though I wanted more between Margulies and Charles or Noth.

Julianna Margulies makes me take off a star off. Her acting is so dry and she doesn't have any facial expressions. The writing is great. I feel like it's a good representation of how those characters would live.

I had never watched the Good Wife but I watched the Season 1 pilot on Prime,  and then have blown through the first three seasons in a couple of months.  I am starting season 4 in order to be caught up when Season 5 begins this fall.  Hate to have to buy Season 4 but what can I do?  Love all three lead women characters...so smart, sassy and in control.  Great writing and great acting.
This is one of my all time favorite shows to watch.  Being able to watch it on Amazon is a real treat.

Good show!!  I do not like the very liberal slant, though. Is that so necessary?  Why alienate so many viewers? And why alienate Christians who were founders of our country, and a large part of our population?

It all started with season 1 and it just kept geeting better! Not sure if it's the composure, sexitude, or chemistry that the cast has but I love to watch Alicia Floreck and Will together as well as Carrie and Callinda. Always good entertainment!
The soap opera continues with the economy of sets. The last few minutes of play at the end of season one promise wholesale changes in year four.

Okay this is better. I enjoy courtroom drama movies and TV shows. Season one of The Good Wife was good enough that I suggested my wife and I might watch it together. She usually likes murder mysteries. But season two changed my mind and I suggested to my wife that the program had taken a negative turn and I'd continue to watch it on my own.

What I saw in season two was way too much back stabbing, shifty dialog, and untrustworthy people. All believable but not what I want to watch. The legal firm also was fixated on it's monetary problems, laying people off, and accepting new members into the firm solely for the money they could bring in regardless of their ethics. Season three is a refreshing departure.

Season three seems to have much smarter writing. A big step back in all of the office politics, and more focus on cases. I'm only 1/2 way through the season but enjoying it very much.
Excellent scripts with plenty of surprises.  Very good acting by all in the show.  Very nice to have dialog scripted on screen.
I can't wait for season 4 to come to  Amazon prime. I love the show and I enjoyed every episode
I never watched this show when it was out, but I started watching it at Season one online.  I was hooked after the first show.

I Think the characters fit there parts It makes it very believable
everyday life . I look forward to seeing it everyweek.

At times a little slow, but I love seeing Alicia come into her own as a single parent and more experienced lawyer. High quality writing and actors including many wonderful guest stars.
Characters ,story lines very were most interesting ,kept me wanting more .I'm sorry I ran out of episodes to watch.

We enjoyed this series at first, but then "the good wife" decided she was not very good at all, and became a character that we just did not like.  The show turned into having a bunch of back-plots filled with nothing but cheating, which got old.  We ended up no longer watching the series.
This is a great drama with interesting and believable characters.  It caught my interest and kept it, I've watched all the seasons.
Love the Good Wife.  The characters are conniving, secretive, jealous, sneaky and wonderfully entertaining!  I wish Season 4 was available to Prime members!!
Great TV Series with excellent plots and actors.  Every show you watch makes you want to watch the next one to see what's going to happen next.  Exciting.
I really enjoy this cat and mouse game between the characters, it makes for good fun while watching the show
I can't stop watching it, I can't wait untill I have time for watching the next chapter. It's a must.
Most enjoyable. my wife really enjoys it, over and over and over.there is great acting great story lines great direct thing can't wait for The fifth season.
I definitely wish Amazon had season 4 for free on Amazon Prime. I am definitely ready to watch the next season after season 3.
This show is great!  It is smart, funny, and original.  I zipped through all the seasons in no time at all!
"It's a Good Show" my co-worker told me, as she is the one that uses our work account to watch it.
I love this series.  I love that so many secondary characters are more than one-dimensional.  I like that every major character is multi-faceted and no one is purely good or evil.

My sister recommended The Good Wife and I watched seasons 1, 2, and 3.  I was very, very disappointed that I could not get season 4 unless I purchased it.  This  really annoys me, because I am still behind when the new season begins.  So while I rate the Good Wife at 4 Stars, I rate Amazon's service at 1 Star.
The Good Wife is a show with a poor title, but it makes up for it with great storylines, interesting characters, and plot twists that will keep you coming back.
This show keeps getting better with each season. I love the character development that ties in perfectly with the various cases the attorneys are working on.

You know, when you try and figure out what makes this show so great, it takes a sec.  It has the basic story line that is solid, and it has the stuff going on right at the edge and such that only adds to the shows interest.
I could watch these episodes til the cows come home. Aside from having compelling story lines, it is wonderful visually. Not to mention the fashion...

I was so hooked on this season that I couldn't stop watching and ended up staying up all night. I would have stayed up longer if my stamina hadn't given out.  This show is high quality from top to bottom---from production values to the cast of incredibly talented actors.  Amazon Prime is awesome!! I love the ability to watch it on my TV using Amazon Prime and the quality is absolutely top notch as well.  I find that Amazon Prime has a lot more viewing options than Netflix for me and I prefer it.  Although Season 4 is not free with Amazon Prime, it's still available via Amazon and definitely worth the cost to view the season.  I'm a very pleased customer.
The acting team on The Good Wife is superb and pulls of a very believable performance. It's nice to see a T.V. show that isn't using lewd humour or sex to get ratings.

I really never watched this show on CBS Sunday evenings but since I started watching it on Amazon Video I could not stop. Maybe it is because of the commercials on regular TV but one thing for sure I went through all 3 seasons (22 episodes each) in under 3 weeks. Now I need to try and watch Season 4 before Season 5 starts in September. This show is FANTASTIC. It just mesmerizes you. As soon as 1 episode is over you almost have to start watching the next episode. Just when you think that the 2nd or 3rd episode is dealing with new story lines the 4th episode brings back stories from the first and second episodes.
Touch to the Producers and Script Writers.
Touch to Juliana Marguiles and the entire cast, and most important, thank you Amazon for giving me Amazon Video.

Season 3 shows The Good Wife is holding up well with each new season. The excellent cast is stable and they continue to introduce interesting and well-cast guest stars. With any luck this series will continue for another 4 or 5 years!
We like the characters and the twists and turns of the story. It is like viewing "behind the scene" of how lawyers think and work.

Love this series......can't wait for the next....highly recommend, great acting!
Makes you want to tear your hair out sometime, but always anxious for the next
This show is one of the best where the title does not do it justice. I watch the show for Kalinda and Mr. Gold the rest of the storylines and actors are just fillers

Originally I started watching this series in Las Vegas. Being hooked from the beginning I've made it a part if my week to week routine. It's very well written, and the actors are great at portraying the script like its real life.

This show is entertaining and has thoughtful stories. It has good twists and turns which seem more realistic than most shows. Character development is always in the foreground and not shoved to the side.
Cast is great... episodes keep you coming back for more.  I am waiting for the next season to be available.
Been wanting to watch this for years.  Glad it is part of the Amazon Prime Network.  Just can't wait for season 4 to be released for Prime members.
Characters are believable in adult situations.  Can't wait for Season 4 to be ready.  We need more show like this one.
Very good plot lines and character development.  Seems pretty true to life.  Accurate portrayal of big law firms. Liked it.

I personally did not care for Season Two and was unsure how this season would go. It vastly exceeded my expectations, and might be the best season yet! It continued with ongoing plot lines, yet did not extend them too long and wrapped them up in a timely fashion. I highly recommend it!

The good wife continues to present a believable plot with plenty of twists and turns to hold one's interest.  The characters mature into real scoundrels or some surprising "good guys", effectively eliciting a growing emotional response from the viewer.  If real lawyers behave like this I can see why they are so disliked!
The characters are so well portrayed, and while every episode is about a new court case, the ongoing story lines are still strongly in play.

Even if you don't know much about law and politics, or if you don't find them interesting,  you may still enjoy this show. There is such a broad range of cases in every episode, plus the typical addicting drama from work the characters' personal lives. Watch it.
I CANNOT stop watching! When one episode is done...you can't wait to watch the next one. Great quality...I'm still finishing up this season, so who knows what will happen.
Enjoying this series.  Well acted and good plot development.  Enjoying both the legal cases and the people stories in this show.

This is a fabulous show.  Juliana Marguiles kills it!  She is fantastic.  The rest of the cast is also great.
Totally addicted to this show! Love how they have their own issues but they still have a bond with each other.
OMG. This series has it all and always leaves you wanting more. Did the season have to end? Can't wait to get my hands on Season 4.
Good plots, interesting legal issues, find the characters interesting and the actors perfect for the parts. Look forward to seeing season 4 !!!
There are so few programs on TV today that have good intriguing plots with many story lines AND great actors.
This show was worth a few laughs and certainly entertaining for a few hours. Video streaming quality was excellent as always.

Dull. Same old stuff, little character growth, nothing to hold the viewer to the screen. TV is the media of the masses, if looking for entertainment, reading a book is more satisfying. Or, try The Killing and Falling Skies, both of which are excellent.

Unlike many shows that start slow and either improve or stall out, this show started on top and maintains the level of entertainment while increasing interest in each new case and character.  Great show!

The acting continues to get better and overall it is an excellent program.
The women are especially good and it is easy to feel the tension and problems.
I am sooo excited for Season 4!  This show is my detox each day at the gym.  I watch it on my IPAD.  It is a fairly straight forward story line, but is most enjoyable and entertaining!

I was a fan of The Good Wife years ago but didn't have time to catch it all due to school and work. When I found out Amazon added seasons 1-3 to prime, I was really excited. Now my wife is an even bigger fan. We just purchased season 4. I hope it's just as good. Great show.

I've followed this series on Amazon Prime videos and was so disappointed when season 4 was not available. I've  enjoyed the series.  The characters are real, intelligent and complicated by life's twists and turns.  It's easy to get hooked!
Missed this show when it aired - Prime member much easier to view without ads. Highly recommend all seasons - thanks
This is a great show and a must see. Something everyone should watch. Just the right amount of drama and intrigue.

All I want is more The Good Wife. Best show available on Amazon Prime, after Downton Abbey! Juliana Marguiles is incredible as usual, and this season leaves you wanting season 4 right away (so let's go ahead and add it, ok, Amazon/CBS??)
Great season.  The show is fast streaming and has great video and audio quality. My husband and i love this show!
I like the court scences and the arguments. But Kalinda seems to be overly mysterious! Good stories well told. I like it.
This is a fantastic how with great writing and every character is extremely interesting, not just the main few. Watch!

This is one of the best written TV series of all time.  It involves well-developed characters, and excellent plots, all  evolving in real life attorney/client situations.  It is so well written, that most of the "bad guys" are well portrayed, if not actually enjoyable.  The writers capture current events and current technology to further increase the quality of the series.

This is a great series.  Season 1 and 2 are better, but the characters have me hooked.  Overall, the series is one of the best I've watched.  A series where plot and character showcase the writing and acting and don't depend on the shock value of sex and violence.
